settings.title: VIASOX CARES ABOUT QUALITY
settings.text: Viasox is a North American brand dedicated to helping people with diabetes, aiming to provide customers with the highest quality products to help with their daily diabetic needs. We began our journey as the worldâ€™s first special diabetic sock company, where we kept two things in mind--fashion and practicality! With success in our non-binding sock line, we believed that it was time to provide more for the diabetic community, to which we decided to expand our product line by spanning into different avenues of foot apparel along with personal care products.

settings.title: 14 DAYS MONEY BACK GUARANTEE
settings.text: We are so confident in our products that we offer a one time 30 day replacement policy if you are not satisfied with our products. If you have any issues with your Viasox product such as holes or damages to the product, send us a picture and we will replace it for you or honour a full refund from the receipt date.(Available only once per customer/order).

settings.title: DESIGNED, HANDLED, AND DISTRIBUTED FROM NORTH AMERICA
settings.text: Viasox supports North American manufacturing as well as hiring North American. Viasox also supports diabetic charities within North America and call upon your help to improve the lives of people with diabetes everywhere!

settings.title: A BIG THANKS TO YOU FROM VIASOX
HOW YOU MAKE AN IMPACT
settings.text: When you order from Viasox we donate $1 to a diabetic charity.
